text: All fees owed under this Agreement shall be paid within thirty (30) days of invoice issuance. Late payments may incur interest at a rate of 1.5% per month.
All charges are exclusive of taxes, and the Client is responsible for any applicable sales, VAT, or similar taxes.

Billing occurs monthly in advance. Payment is due upon receipt of invoice. Failure to pay may result in service suspension.
Company is not liable for indirect or consequential damages. Liability is limited to the amount paid in the prior twelve months. These limits apply regardless of claim type.
Customer shall pay all invoices within thirty days. Late payments will incur interest. Fees are non‑refundable except as stated. Taxes are the responsibility of the Customer.
Either party can end it for convenience with notice. Certain sections survive termination. All outstanding obligations remain enforceable.

If this Agreement is terminated, any unpaid fees accrued prior to the termination date shall remain immediately due and payable.
